statements: SELECT * FROM game_transactions WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT transaction_id, player_id, transaction_date FROM game_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT player_id, SUM(virtual_currency_amount) AS total_currency FROM game_transactions GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_currency > 1000;
SELECT * FROM game_transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' AND transaction_date <= '2022-03-31';
SELECT AVG(purchase_amount) AS avg_purchase_amount, MAX(purchase_amount) AS max_purchase_amount FROM game_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase';
SELECT transaction_id, player_id, transaction_type FROM game_transactions WHERE virtual_currency_amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT transaction_id, player_id, purchase_amount FROM game_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT player_id, MIN(virtual_currency_amount) AS min_amount, MAX(virtual_currency_amount) AS max_amount FROM game_transactions GROUP BY player_id HAVING COUNT(*) >= 3;
SELECT AVG(purchase_amount) AS avg_purchase_amount, SUM(virtual_currency_amount) AS total_virtual_currency FROM game_transactions WHERE purchase_amount > 50 AND virtual_currency_amount > 2000;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM game_transactions GROUP BY player_id ORDER BY total_transactions DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, player_id, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'deposit';
SELECT player_id, transaction_type, transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 1000;
SELECT player_id, purchase_type, purchase_date FROM purchases WHERE purchase_type = 'subscription' ORDER BY purchase_date;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT transaction_type, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT player_id FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM transactions WHERE player_id IN ('123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000', '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000');
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT player_name, player_currency FROM player_stats WHERE player_level > 10;
SELECT purchase_item, purchase_amount FROM purchases WHERE player_id = 1001;
SELECT transaction_type, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY transaction_type ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM player_stats WHERE player_level > 5 ORDER BY player_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'deposit' AND transaction_amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT player_name, player_total_purchases FROM player_stats JOIN purchases ON player_stats.player_id = purchases.player_id WHERE purchases.purchase_amount > 50 ORDER BY player_total_purchases ASC;
SELECT player_name, player_currency FROM player_stats WHERE player_currency BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY player_currency DESC;

SELECT player_name, player_level, purchase_item FROM player_stats JOIN purchases ON player_stats.player_id = purchases.player_id WHERE purchases.purchase_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY player_level ASC, purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM virtual_currency_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, transaction_amount FROM virtual_currency_transactions ORDER BY transaction_id DESC;
SELECT player_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_transaction_amount FROM virtual_currency_transactions GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT player_id, purchase_date FROM player_purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT player_id, total_transactions, total_purchases, total_spent FROM player_statistics WHERE total_spent >= 5000;
SELECT * FROM virtual_currency_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_id DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, transaction_amount FROM virtual_currency_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'deposit' ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT player_id, total_transactions, total_purchases FROM player_statistics WHERE total_spent < 5000 ORDER BY total_purchases ASC;

SELECT pp.item_id, pp.purchase_amount, pp.purchase_date, pa.account_balance FROM player_purchases pp JOIN player_accounts pa ON pp.player_id = pa.player_id WHERE pp.purchase_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY pp.purchase_date ASC;

SELECT ps.player_id, ps.total_transactions, pa.account_balance FROM player_statistics ps JOIN player_accounts pa ON ps.player_id = pa.player_id WHERE ps.total_purchases > 10 ORDER BY pa.account_balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT player_id, transaction_type, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT player_id, total_currency FROM players ORDER BY total_currency DESC;
SELECT player_name, join_date FROM players WHERE join_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM player_transactions GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'deposit' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT player_name, total_currency FROM players WHERE total_currency > 1000 ORDER BY total_currency DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 500 AND transaction_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT player_name, SUM(amount) AS total_spent FROM players JOIN player_transactions ON players.player_id = player_transactions.player_id GROUP BY player_name ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT player_name, purchased_item, price FROM players JOIN purchases ON players.player_id = purchases.player_id WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY price ASC, purchase_date DESC;
